Package com.b2international.commons.db

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JdbcUrl
    Represents a JDBC connection URL.
    JdbcUtils
    Provides utility methods for issuing database queries and updates using the JDBC API.
    PreparedBatchedUpdateExecutor
    Allows the client to issue multiple updates to the database with the same prepared statement instance in batches.
    PreparedQueryCollector<T>
    Executes a SQL query and places the results in a collection of objects of type T after conversion.
    PreparedQueryStringCollector
    Executes a SQL that is expected to return a single column of strings, and places the results in a string collection.
    PreparedUpdateExecutor
    Allows the client to issue multiple updates to the database with the same prepared statement instance.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RuntimeSQLException
    Wraps a checked SQLException into a runtime exception, so SQL dependent operations don't need to specify a throws clause in their method signature.
